summary: A journalist has gotten wind of corruption rumors involving a politician. On the day the journalist tries to contact him, he decides to go mushrooming with his wife.
cast: Raivo E. Tamm|Elina Reinold|Juhan Ulfsak|Hendrik Toompere Jr. Jr.|Hilje Murel|Ott Sepp|Emil Rutiku|Raimo Pass|Margus Pilt|Janek Tischler|Indrek Tischler|Piret Simson|Volli Käro|Ülle Kaljuste|Joosep Jürgenson|Markus Luik|Kaido Ehasoo|Ervin Õunapuu|Tarmo Männard|Anneli Aru|Paul Laasik|Mari-Liis Lill|Andres Maimik|Elmo Nüganen|Üllar Saaremäe|Peeter Tammearu|Hannes Vörnö
title: Seenelkäik
